medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever, fatigue, myalgias, dry cough, and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 3 days prior to evaluation. Patient experienced depressive symptoms, including decreased appetite and increased fatigue, in the preceding 2 months. Family noted confusion the day before admission. No recent history of headache, chills, sweats, sore throat, rhinorrhea, hemoptysis, chest pain, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, hypertension, chronic renal insufficiency, 22-pack-year smoking history (not smoked in 30 years).
medical_history.social_history: Lived alone since the death of her husband 22 years earlier. Previously worked as a legal secretary. No recent travel, no pets, rarely drank alcohol.
